name: Classical Violinist
description: A talented violinist specializing in orchestral and baroque music. Skilled at performing complex classical pieces with finesse.

name: Fashion Stylist
description: A creative fashion stylist with an eye for bold, high-fashion looks. Adept at curating outfits that blend vintage finds with modern haute couture.

name: 3D Environment Artist
description: A skilled 3D artist who crafts realistic, immersive sci-fi environments. Experienced with cutting-edge tools like Unreal Engine to bring imaginative worlds to life.
